programme.title: Anna, la romancière
programme.desc: Il faut dire qu'en matière d'imagination sexuelle, elle est intarissable ! Sous le regard complice du spectateur, elle se livre à une démonstration éclatante de son talent : à mesure qu'elle les écrit, les scènes de sexe de son roman prennent vie.

programme.title: Night Call
programme.desc: A Los Angeles, Lou Bloom, criminel qui vit d'expédients, découvre le travail des cameramen, à la recherche d'images explosives. Il s'en procure une et décide de se mettre à son compte. Ses moyens et son matériel sont très limités et ses premiers essais sont hasardeux mais Lou persévère. Il veut se faire une place dans le métier et impressionner Nina Romina, directrice de l'information de Channel 6, une chaine de télévision locale.

programme.title: Toute ressemblance...
programme.desc: Alors que, traversant une mauvaise passe, il est poursuivi par des paparazzi sous le pont de l'Alma, Cédric Saint Guérande, le plus célèbre présentateur de journal télévisé de France, repense à ses débuts, 18 ans plus tôt, quand le fade Jean-Charles Balin tenait son poste et que Cédric travaillait dans on ombre. Il se souvient du moment où son destin bascule, le 11 septembre 2001, quand il se retrouve à la place de Balin devant les caméras pour présenter le journal télévisé. Pour Cédric, c'est le début d'une irrésistible ascension.

programme.title: Ride Sally ride
programme.desc: Quelques mois après leur rupture, Alice et Samuel se retrouvent sur le parking d'un restoroute pour se rendre leurs dernières affaires. Les retrouvailles sont tendues, lorsqu'un aveu inattendu vient bouleverser la donne. Entre regain amoureux et relents du passé, où les mènera cette journée ?..

programme.title: La vie c'est pas un jeu
M. Peabody et Sherman : Les voyages dans le temps
programme.desc: M.. Peabody n'est pas un chien comme les autres. C'est un inventeur de génie. Père adoptif de Sherman, un petit garçon, il a imaginé une machine à voyager dans le temps afin de lui enseigner l'histoire. A Versailles, en 1789, Sherman et Peabody sont poursuivis par des révolutionnaires mais réussissent à échapper à la guillotine. Lors de son premier jour d'école, Sherman subit les brimades de la petite Penny. Peabody organise alors un dîner pour que les deux enfants fassent la paix. Mais durant la soirée, Penny monte dans la machine à voyager dans le temps et disparaît au temps des pharaons.

programme.title: Une femme douce
programme.desc: Dans un village reculé Russie, une femme, déboutée par l'administration pénitentiaire, se voit retourner un colis qu'elle avait destiné quelques temps plus tôt à son mari incarcéré, à l’autre bout du pays, pour un crime qu'il n'a pas commis. Inquiète et désemparée, elle décide d’aller le porter elle-même à son époux. Mais, entre la mauvaise foi des fonctionnaires et la corruption des policiers, son parcours est semé d’embûches et d’humiliations. Arrivé au pénitencier, elle demande alors à voir son mari, mais personne ne peut lui dire où il se trouve.

programme.title: Late Night
programme.desc: Katherine Newbury, une présentatrice de talk show, est entourée d'auteurs masculins qu'elle tyrannise. Brad, son adjoint, lui conseille d'engager une plume féminine. Ce sera la positive Molly, d'origine indienne et dont l'unique expérience est d'écrire des blagues pour ses collègues d'un complexe chimique. Surnommée "huit" par sa nouvelle patronne, Molly fait ce qu'elle peut pour s'imposer. Entre-temps, la patronne de la chaîne annonce à Katherine qu'elle sera bientôt débarquée du show. Avec Molly et son équipe, celle-ci réussit à créer à nouveau le buzz autour de l'émission.

programme.title: Jackpot
programme.desc: Abandonnée par son fiancé Mason, Joy McNally s'offre une virée à Las Vegas, capitale mondiale du jeu. Là, elle fait la connaissance du séduisant Jack Fuller, qui vient de se faire renvoyer par son patron. Après une nuit arrosée, les deux jeunes gens se réveillent dans le même lit, la bague au doigt et avec un chèque de trois millions de dollars ! De retour à New York, ils se disputent le magot.

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E3 Un menu C13, sans orgasme, ni capote

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E4 Sacré coup ta mère

programme.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
programme.desc: Quadragénaire, Cal vit depuis vingt-cinq ans avec sa femme Emily, qui lui a donné deux beaux enfants. Sa vie bascule le jour où il apprend que cette dernière l'a trompé. Cal décide de divorcer et devient un homme solitaire. Dans un bar, il rencontre Jacob, un séducteur professionnel qui accumule les conquêtes. Il accepte de prendre Cal sous son aile et de le transformer en don juan. Les résultats ne se font pas attendre.

programme.title: Mississippi Grind
programme.desc: Quand il n'écoute pas dans sa voiture des enregistrements contenant des conseils de professionnels du poker, Gerry, lui-même joueur qui traverse une mauvaise passe, écume les salles de jeu du Sud des Etats-Unis. C'est sur l'une d'entre elles qu'il croise Curtis, un jeune joueur aussi volubile que doué, qui adore raconter nombre d'anecdotes pendant qu'il joue. Quelques heures après leur partie, les deux hommes se retrouvent dans un bar pour échanger sur leurs expériences. Gerry est vite fasciné par le côté imprévisible dans le jeu de Curtis.

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: A Hongkong, J.S. Cheung, officier de police spécialiste du déminage et des explosifs, a depuis longtemps infiltré le gang du redoutable Peng Hong, qui multiplie les braquages hautement préparés. Pour leur nouveau coup, les gangsters ont mis en place un dispositifs de taxis piégés, leur permettant de détourner l'attention des forces de l'ordre. Alors que les braqueurs sèment le chaos, Cheung, dans un de leurs véhicule, fait tout pour les empêcher de nuire. Ce faisant, il parvient à arrêter le jeune frère de Peng Hong alors que celui-ci parvient à prendre la fuite.

programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty
programme.desc: Après le 11 Septembre, la CIA met en place des cellules de recherche pour localiser Ben Laden. La jeune Maya est ainsi envoyée au Pakistan. A l'ambassade, dans une ambiance tendue, elle rejoint l'équipe de Joseph Bradley. Là, elle rencontre Dan qui torture un prisonnier pour essayer d'obtenir des informations sur les réseaux islamistes. Ce dernier leur parle un jour d'Abu Ahmed, qui serait un proche de Ben Laden.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A New York, en 1933, le cinéaste Carl Denham engage la jeune actrice Ann Darrow pour son prochain film qui doit se dérouler à Skull Island, à l'est de Sumatra. Inexplorée, l'île abriterait une divinité mystérieuse vénérée par les indigènes. Après un difficile voyage en mer, l'équipe du tournage débarque. Très vite, Ann est enlevé par des cannibales puis offerte en sacrifice à Kong, un singe gigantesque.

programme.title: Nos futurs
programme.desc: Yann Kerbec mène une existence trop bien rangée, entre un poste de cadre à responsabilités dans une société d'assurances vie et sa vie avec son épouse, Estelle, parfaite. Après sa fête d'anniversaire, il décide de reprendre contact avec Thomas, un camarade de lycée. Au contraire de Yann, Thomas semble n'avoir absolument pas changé. Il est resté le jeune homme amusant et inconséquent qu'il était à l'époque.

programme.title: Anna et Otto
programme.desc: Anna et Otto sont frère et sœur. Alors qu'ils ont une vingtaine d'années, le divorce de leurs parents les sépare brutalement : Otto part vivre avec son père à Montréal tandis qu'Anna reste à Paris avec sa mère. Ils sont sûrs qu'ils se reverront vite, mais la vie et ses aléas les tiennent éloignés l'un de l'autre. Incapables de se montrer et de se dire qu'ils s'aiment, Anna et Otto se débattent avec maladresse dans le tumulte de leurs sentiments..

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: En 1941, à Belfast, alors que l'Irlande, plusieurs fois bombardée, subit les ravages de la guerre, le zoo de Bellevue accueille un nouveau pensionnaire de poids, un éléphanteau. Familier du directeur, monsieur Shawcross, Tom, fils de George Hall, le vétérinaire du zoo, se précipite aussitôt pour rendre visite à l'animal, qu'il baptise bien vite Buster. Mais cette bonne nouvelle est vite assombrie par une autre, quand l'adolescent apprend que son père vient d'être mobilisé et part bientôt au front.

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E3 Un menu C13, sans orgasme, ni capote

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E4 Sacré coup ta mère

programme.title: Madagascar 2
programme.desc: Après avoir fui New York et échoué à Madagascar, Alex le lion, Marty le zèbre, Melman la girafe et Gloria l'hippopotame, parviennent à atteindre les plaines d'Afrique grâce à l'aide des pingouins, qui ont réparé l'épave d'un avion. Là, tous ont l'occasion de renouer avec leurs familles éloignées et leurs racines. Marty est comme un poisson dans l'eau, tandis qu'Alex, trop habitué au béton de la Grosse Pomme, ne retrouve pas ses instincts. Quant à la girafe, elle tente par tous les moyens d'avouer son amour à Gloria tandis que celle-ci est courtisée de toutes parts.

programme.title: Madagascar 3 : Bons baisers d'Europe
programme.desc: Alex le lion, Marty le zèbre, Gloria l'hippopotame et Melman la girafe sont toujours en Afrique. Ils souhaitent rentrer à New York et décident de rallier Monte-Carlo, pour profiter de l'avion de leurs amis les pingouins. Là, ils sont pris en chasse par le redoutable Capitaine Chantal Dubois mais réussissent à lui échapper. Dans les Alpes, Alex et les siens croisent la route d'un cirque itinérant. Ils y voient un bon moyen de retourner aux Etats-Unis.

programme.title: Boule et Bill
programme.desc: En France, en 1976, Boule, 9 ans, et ses parents s'arrêtent au chenil lors d'une promenade dominicale et ils découvrent un cocker. Malgré l'opposition du père, le chiot, baptisé Bill, est rapidement adopté. Mais, bien qu'animé de bonnes intentions, il multiplie les catastrophes. Quand la famille doit déménager pour Paris, le père tente, sans succès, d'en profiter pour se débarrasser de lui. C'est le moment où la tortue Caroline intègre la famille. Elle tombe amoureuse de Bill.

programme.title: Marie Stuart, reine d'Ecosse
programme.desc: Dans la seconde moitié du XVIe siècle, Marie Stuart, née catholique et encore enfant, est envoyée en France alors que les protestants se battent pour le contrôle de l'Ecosse. A 15 ans, elle épouse l'héritier du trône de France. A 18 ans, veuve, elle rentre dans une Ecosse dominée par les protestants et gouvernée par son demi-frère, le comte de Moray. Elisabeth est la reine protestante de l'Angleterre et Marie, qui peut légitimement prétendre au trône de par sa naissance, constitue une menace pour la reine.

programme.title: Anonymous
programme.desc: En Angleterre, sous le règne de la Reine Elizabeth, Edward de Vere, comte d'Oxford, est, depuis son plus jeune âge, un écrivain de génie. Son rang ne lui permet pas d'endosser la paternité de ses œuvres, très critiques à l'égard de certaines personnes haut placées à la Cour. Il demande à Ben Jonson, modeste auteur, de les signer pour lui. William Shakespeare, un comédien de la troupe, va profiter de la situation.

programme.title: The Passenger
programme.desc: Michael MacCauley, agent en assurances consciencieux dans une entreprise new yorkaise, mène une vie très bien réglée, rythmée par ses trajets quotidiens en train de banlieue. Alors qu'il vient d'apprendre qu'il était renvoyé après dix ans de bons et loyaux services, Michael, ancien policier, rejoint Alex, un ex-collègue dans un bar, avant de reprendre le train pour sa maison en banlieue. C'est au cours du trajet qu'il est interpellé par une femme mystérieuse, Joanna, qui lui propose de se livrer à une étrange expérience.

programme.title: Toute ressemblance...
programme.desc: Alors que, traversant une mauvaise passe, il est poursuivi par des paparazzi sous le pont de l'Alma, Cédric Saint Guérande, le plus célèbre présentateur de journal télévisé de France, repense à ses débuts, 18 ans plus tôt, quand le fade Jean-Charles Balin tenait son poste et que Cédric travaillait dans on ombre. Il se souvient du moment où son destin bascule, le 11 septembre 2001, quand il se retrouve à la place de Balin devant les caméras pour présenter le journal télévisé. Pour Cédric, c'est le début d'une irrésistible ascension.

programme.title: Salaud on t'aime
programme.desc: Jacques Kaminski, photographe de guerre, s'installe dans les Alpes pour profiter paisiblement de sa retraite. Alors qu'il vient de quitter sa femme, il s'éprend peu à peu de Nathalie Beranger, l'agent immobilier qui lui a trouvé sa maison. Parallèlement, il tente, en vain, de faire venir ses quatre filles, Printemps, Eté, Automne et Hiver. Son meilleur ami et médecin, Frédéric Selman, qui séjourne chez lui, ment aux quatre filles : il affirme que Jacques est atteint d'une grave maladie, espérant les faire venir.

programme.title: Femmes de loi
programme.sub-title: S2 E5 À bout de force

programme.desc: Zwischen 21 Uhr und 6 Uhr legt KiKA eine Sendepause ein.

programme.title: Retouches
programme.desc: Le mari de Maryam a un accident à la maison et, plutôt que de le sauver, elle décide de ne pas intervenir et l'observe en train de mourir.

programme.title: Below the Surface
programme.desc: Philip découvre l'identité d'un des preneurs d'otages et fait ainsi le lien entre l'affaire en cours et sa propre histoire. Comme il refuse de révéler à Hans dans quelles circonstances il a connu le criminel, celui-ci prend le commandement de l'équipe. Palle Wulff, le chef d'état-major, dévoile aux policiers des informations confidentielles. Les preneurs d'otages commencent à montrer des signes de fatigue. Hans décide qu'il faut profiter de cette occasion pour agir..

programme.title: Below the Surface
programme.desc: Philip descend dans le métro dans l'espoir de libérer les trois derniers otages. Il se retrouve alors face à un homme qu'il pensait mort..

programme.title: Iron Jawed Angels
Alice Paul – Der Weg ins Licht
programme.desc: Iron Jawed Angels: Directed by Katja von Garnier. With Hilary Swank, Margo Martindale, Anjelica Huston, Frances O'Connor. Defiant young activists take the women's suffrage movement by storm, putting their lives at risk to help American women win the right to vote." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0338139/","name":"Iron Jawed Angels","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGJjODFhMDktYjQyYy00M2JmLWJmMWUtYWFhNmJhZWUxOTk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDkzNTM2ODg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Defiant young activists take the women's suffrage movement by storm, putting their lives at risk to help American women win the right to vote.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0338139/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"debw"},"dateCreated":"2004-10-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Women should view","reviewBody":"I just viewed this film and was very moved by the story and the performances. Hillary Swank was excellent as Alice and brought a believability to the character which the history books cannot convey.\n\nAll women should view this film, especially those who choose not to vote. While I have always exercised my right to vote, I did not realize what sacrifices were made so that I would have that right. Viewing this film should be part of American History classes. I don't remember ever reading about this in my history class. What perfect timing to have it air before this very important election.It reminds us that most freedoms that we enjoy are only won after much fierce determination, sacrifice, and overcoming overwhelming odds."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5965,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2004-02-15","keywords":"the white house,flower,period drama,reference to ida b. wells,african american woman","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Iron Jawed Angels","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1955725593","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE3Y2IwYzgtNzAwNS00NTVlLTg3NjktODZmMDM3MDFmMGM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE3Y2IwYzgtNzAwNS00NTVlLTg3NjktODZmMDM3MDFmMGM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005476/","name":"Hilary Swank"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0553269/","name":"Margo Martindale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001378/","name":"Anjelica Huston"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0902290/","name":"Katja von Garnier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132151/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176202/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1359555/","name":"Jennifer Friedes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0548736/","name":"Sally Robinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0098316/","name":"Eugenia Bostwick-Singer"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 10155688, Title: Mare of Easttown, --- Description: Mare of Easttown: Created by Brad Ingelsby. With Kate Winslet, Julianne Nicholson, Jean Smart, Angourie Rice. A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10155688/","name":"Mare of Easttown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjIyOGU1NzAtODZmYi00NGMzLWJiMjItNGNjNTFjOTM5ZDJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10155688/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TxMike","dateCreated":"2021-10-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Kate Winslet does a superb turn as Mare, a detective in this small community.","reviewBody":"We don't have an HBO subscription so I was able to view this limited series (7 episodes, each roughly one hour) on a set of DVDs from my public library. My wife started with me but abandoned it after just half of the first episode, she didn't like the brusque nature of Mare, but that is part of her character arc, influenced by losses she had recently suffered. I believe my wife would have enjoyed the series if she had stuck with it.

It is set in the somewhat fictional town of Easttown, but in fact much of it does take place in the real Easttown Township, Pa. A community where most everyone knows everyone else and many are related to each other. A community where people often don't even knock or ring the doorbell when going to visit someone, they just walk it.

There are two significant crimes causing community friction, one is the disappearance of two young ladies, the other is a murder of a third young lady. They might be connected, they might not. Much of the roughly 7 hours of running time is in some way associated with trying to solve those crimes. They eventually are, they involve people of the community, and there are some big surprises along the way. And there are a number of Red herrings to keep the viewers guessing.

It is clearly fiction but what makes it so good and so interesting are the characters that really could be real people in any small community. Plus the dialog is uniformly well written. The discs have a number of interesting "making of" extras and it is revealed that Winslet often modified the written dialog, adding or substituting things that would make Mare more realistic.

Watching the whole thing is a big investment of time but I am glad I did, overall very interesting. And Winslet shows why she is one of the best of her generation.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":118531,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2021-04-18","keywords":"lesbian daughter,murder,murder investigation,missing persons case,female detective","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629855/","name":"Julianne Nicholson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005443/","name":"Jean Smart"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0881218/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0881219/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2145487/","name":"Brad Ingelsby"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3833774105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Academy Award®-winner Kate Winslet plays Mare Sheehan, a small-town Pennsylvania detective who investigates a local murder as life crumbles around her. From creator and writer Brad Ingelsby ("The Way Back"), with all episodes directed by Craig Zobel (HBO’s "The Leftovers"), the seven-part limited series is an exploration into the dark side of a close community and an authentic examination of how family and past tragedies can define our present. "</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 8772296, Title: Euphoria, --- Description: Euphoria: Created by Sam Levinson. With Zendaya, Hunter Schafer, Sydney Sweeney, Jacob Elordi. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0318997, Title: Angels in America, --- Description: Angels in America: With Al Pacino, Mary-Louise Parker, Justin Kirk, Jeffrey Wright. Playwright Tony Kushner adapted his political epic about the AIDS crisis during the mid 1980s and centers the story around a group of disparate but connected individuals." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0318997/","name":"Angels in America","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjJlM2RhNTgtYTQxMy00ZmJkLWIxNDQtOTQzYjg5Y2Y4YjUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc3MjQzNTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Playwright Tony Kushner adapted his political epic about the AIDS crisis during the mid 1980s and centers the story around a group of disparate but connected individuals.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0318997/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"psychopathicgroupie","dateCreated":"2004-12-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"a must-see and one of my all-time favorites.","reviewBody":"Angels in America is definitely one of my favorites. I was a loyal viewer when it was on HBO, and rushed out to buy the DVD when it was released. I think this miniseries was very tastefully done. I was delighted to see such diversity in the movie. It was very refreshing to see Jews, Mormons, Protestants, Homosexuals, Heterosexuals, Republicans, and Democrats together. I think this movie was very real in it's portrayal of AIDS, and it really raised awareness for me, because it showed AIDS as a real disease, not just something we hear about on the news. I was very excited to see minorities presented like average, real people. I didn't see the play, so i can't compare. but i was thoroughly pleased with Mike Nichols direction, i think the cast was incredible, and brought life to each character in the best way possible. i think Mary-Louise Parker especially brought with her character, Harper Pitt, something to the play that was very difficult to do. Harper, other than her marriage to Joe, was irrelevant to the story; Parker was able to take the character, though, and make Harper one of the most insightful and endearing characters in the show. I especially like Justin Kirk in this movie. He did not have a particularly challenging part, but he really grabbed my heart in a subtle way. I have heard much criticism directed toward Al Pacino. However, i think Pacino did very well as is character. I have little knowledge of the real Cohn, but Pacinio was able to give Cohn an evil personality, while still keeping the audience aware of how human Cohn really is. It was very interesting. I was also very pleased with the characters of Belize and Mother Pitt. I found Angels in America very inspiring, and after seeing it for the first time, I seemed to see the world in a whole new light. I know that sounds cheesy, but it is true. For someone very passionate about equal rights, like me, this movie seemed to relay exactly what I stand for. If you are an easily offended Conservative, this movie may not be for you, but I recommend this to anyone with an open mind.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":27229,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2003-12-07","keywords":"hiv,death,loneliness,valium,heaven","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0240889/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094563/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Angels in America","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3786801433","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0NDZkNWYtMzk0Zi00ZDZlLTkwODYtNWMwZTVlZWE4ZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0NDZkNWYtMzk0Zi00ZDZlLTkwODYtNWMwZTVlZWE4ZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from HBO Home Video"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mare of Easttown
Mare of Easttown

credits.actor: Kate Winslet, Evan Peters, Guy Pearce, Angourie Rice, Cailee Spaeny

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 10155688, Title: Mare of Easttown, --- Description: Mare of Easttown: Created by Brad Ingelsby. With Kate Winslet, Julianne Nicholson, Jean Smart, Angourie Rice. A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10155688/","name":"Mare of Easttown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjIyOGU1NzAtODZmYi00NGMzLWJiMjItNGNjNTFjOTM5ZDJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10155688/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TxMike","dateCreated":"2021-10-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Kate Winslet does a superb turn as Mare, a detective in this small community.","reviewBody":"We don't have an HBO subscription so I was able to view this limited series (7 episodes, each roughly one hour) on a set of DVDs from my public library. My wife started with me but abandoned it after just half of the first episode, she didn't like the brusque nature of Mare, but that is part of her character arc, influenced by losses she had recently suffered. I believe my wife would have enjoyed the series if she had stuck with it.

It is set in the somewhat fictional town of Easttown, but in fact much of it does take place in the real Easttown Township, Pa. A community where most everyone knows everyone else and many are related to each other. A community where people often don't even knock or ring the doorbell when going to visit someone, they just walk it.

There are two significant crimes causing community friction, one is the disappearance of two young ladies, the other is a murder of a third young lady. They might be connected, they might not. Much of the roughly 7 hours of running time is in some way associated with trying to solve those crimes. They eventually are, they involve people of the community, and there are some big surprises along the way. And there are a number of Red herrings to keep the viewers guessing.

It is clearly fiction but what makes it so good and so interesting are the characters that really could be real people in any small community. Plus the dialog is uniformly well written. The discs have a number of interesting "making of" extras and it is revealed that Winslet often modified the written dialog, adding or substituting things that would make Mare more realistic.

Watching the whole thing is a big investment of time but I am glad I did, overall very interesting. And Winslet shows why she is one of the best of her generation.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":118531,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2021-04-18","keywords":"lesbian daughter,murder,murder investigation,missing persons case,female detective","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629855/","name":"Julianne Nicholson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005443/","name":"Jean Smart"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0881218/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0881219/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2145487/","name":"Brad Ingelsby"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3833774105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Academy Award®-winner Kate Winslet plays Mare Sheehan, a small-town Pennsylvania detective who investigates a local murder as life crumbles around her. From creator and writer Brad Ingelsby ("The Way Back"), with all episodes directed by Craig Zobel (HBO’s "The Leftovers"), the seven-part limited series is an exploration into the dark side of a close community and an authentic examination of how family and past tragedies can define our present. "</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Truman
Truman – Der Mann, der Geschichte schrieb
programme.desc:
Truman: Directed by Frank Pierson. With Gary Sinise, Diana Scarwid, Richard Dysart, Colm Feore. Though considered unqualified, Harry S. Truman becomes the 33rd president following the April 1945 death of Franklin D. Roosevelt." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114738/","name":"Truman","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzI3ZmYwOGQtNTc3OC00YjhhLWFkNzQtNTZlNGFiODI1ODkyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Though considered unqualified, Harry S. Truman becomes the 33rd president following the April 1945 death of Franklin D. Roosevelt.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114738/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mstomaso"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Imperfect but good biographical sketch","reviewBody":"Harry Truman was an American president of rare integrity. Steadfastly honest and loyal to his friends, his causes, and his own heart, and born into a lower middle class farming family, Truman stands out as a real anomaly in 20th century American politics. Like similar men of profound integrity, such as John Adams, his presidency was a turbulent time of great triumphs for freedom and democracy and huge problems for ethics, nationalism and human rights. And as the symbol and scapegoat of those times, Truman, again like Adams, played his role - whether cast as hero or villain - with profound dignity. This film tells his story from his enlistment in the armed forces during World War One, at the age of 33, to his retirement from politics about 35 years later.

The characters of this film are portrayed sensitively and authentically. Truman and his wife, and the controversial Generals Marshall and MacArthur are particularly impressive. In some cases - particularly the Trumans themselves - this must have been a fairly difficult effort. Truman was not a very dramatic and flashy person, and his wife was fairly detached and private. Sinise and Scarwid play the parts and the relationship perfectly.

Since the study of history is a big part of my career, I am writing from a slightly unusual perspective. "Truman" has all the pedigree for what should have been a really powerful biographical film - a great lead actor, a solid supporting cast, a good production team, a great story and a very strong writing team. And it is refreshing to see such an accurate portrayal of a true hero of American politics and such a vivid realization of his times. Despite all of this, I feel that Truman could have been a better film - more dramatic, more visually powerful and more poignant. Somewhere between the script and the directing, a bit of cinematic art was lost and never quite recovered. Historiographically, this is a satisfying film, but it does not go too far past "satisfying".","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2331,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"1995-09-09","keywords":"character name as title,douglas macarthur character,franklin d. roosevelt character,the white house,harry s. truman character","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000641/","name":"Gary Sinise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0769311/","name":"Diana Scarwid"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0246004/","name":"Richard Dysart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682757/","name":"Frank Pierson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114242/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0567184/","name":"David McCullough"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0725564/","name":"Thomas Rickman"}],"duration":"PT2H15M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Gary Sinise (role=Harry S. Truman), Diana Scarwid (role=Bess Truman), Richard Dysart (role=Henry L. Stimson), Colm Feore (role=Charlie Ross), James Gammon (role=Sam Rayburn), Tony Goldwyn (role=Clark Clifford), Pat Hingle (role=Boss Tom Pendergast), Harris Yulin (role=General George Marshall), Leo Burmester (role=Frank Vassar), Amelia Campbell (role=Margaret Truman), Virginia Capers (role=Elizabeth Moore), John Finn (role=Bob Hannegan)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0114738, Title: Truman, --- Description: Truman: Directed by Frank Pierson. With Gary Sinise, Diana Scarwid, Richard Dysart, Colm Feore. Though considered unqualified, Harry S. Truman becomes the 33rd president following the April 1945 death of Franklin D. Roosevelt." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114738/","name":"Truman","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzI3ZmYwOGQtNTc3OC00YjhhLWFkNzQtNTZlNGFiODI1ODkyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Though considered unqualified, Harry S. Truman becomes the 33rd president following the April 1945 death of Franklin D. Roosevelt.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114738/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mstomaso","dateCreated":"2005-05-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Imperfect but good biographical sketch","reviewBody":"Harry Truman was an American president of rare integrity. Steadfastly honest and loyal to his friends, his causes, and his own heart, and born into a lower middle class farming family, Truman stands out as a real anomaly in 20th century American politics. Like similar men of profound integrity, such as John Adams, his presidency was a turbulent time of great triumphs for freedom and democracy and huge problems for ethics, nationalism and human rights. And as the symbol and scapegoat of those times, Truman, again like Adams, played his role - whether cast as hero or villain - with profound dignity. This film tells his story from his enlistment in the armed forces during World War One, at the age of 33, to his retirement from politics about 35 years later.

The characters of this film are portrayed sensitively and authentically. Truman and his wife, and the controversial Generals Marshall and MacArthur are particularly impressive. In some cases - particularly the Trumans themselves - this must have been a fairly difficult effort. Truman was not a very dramatic and flashy person, and his wife was fairly detached and private. Sinise and Scarwid play the parts and the relationship perfectly.

Since the study of history is a big part of my career, I am writing from a slightly unusual perspective. "Truman" has all the pedigree for what should have been a really powerful biographical film - a great lead actor, a solid supporting cast, a good production team, a great story and a very strong writing team. And it is refreshing to see such an accurate portrayal of a true hero of American politics and such a vivid realization of his times. Despite all of this, I feel that Truman could have been a better film - more dramatic, more visually powerful and more poignant. Somewhere between the script and the directing, a bit of cinematic art was lost and never quite recovered. Historiographically, this is a satisfying film, but it does not go too far past "satisfying".","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2331,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"1995-09-09","keywords":"character name as title,douglas macarthur character,franklin d. roosevelt character,the white house,harry s. truman character","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000641/","name":"Gary Sinise","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0769311/","name":"Diana Scarwid","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0246004/","name":"Richard Dysart"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682757/","name":"Frank Pierson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114242/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0567184/","name":"David McCullough","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0725564/","name":"Thomas Rickman"],"duration":"PT2H15M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Elementary
Elementary
programme.desc:
Elementary: Created by Robert Doherty. With Jonny Lee Miller, Lucy Liu, Aidan Quinn, Jon Michael Hill. A modern take on the cases of Sherlock Holmes, with the detective now living in New York City." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2191671/","name":"Elementary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDEyN2U1YTItNDY1Zi00YjljLWI5YzItNWU3YWViYjhiZTgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A modern take on the cases of Sherlock Holmes, with the detective now living in New York City.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2191671/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"William_G"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"A different spin on a classic, A great show on its own merits","reviewBody":"Like many people, I love BBC's Sherlock and overlooked Elementary for many reasons. I recently decided to give it a chance and was pleasantly surprised to say the least. First off, don't make the same mistake I did and dismiss it for some of the rather odd sounding changes, it's intended to be a different spin on the classic and does so very well.

Jonny Lee Miller plays a great Sherlock. He's more human and flawed, where the original Sherlock was almost cartoonishly strong at times, but he still has the same confident eccentric brilliance that makes Sherlock Holmes so interesting. He's a recovering addict aided by Sober Companion Watson, a modern politically correct spin on classic Holmes drug use that feels tacked on and out of place at times, but helps drive the character development of both Holmes and Watson.

The new Watson angle was a big factor in what made me pass on the show at first. In addition to the Sober Companion job, it sounded very generic Hollywoody to find an excuse to shoehorn in a pretty female co-star, but Lucy Liu is very good in her role. She doesn't play a shallow sexy distraction from the story, rather just a different sex portraying the same inquisitive, intelligent, adventurous companion that Watson should be. And (as far as I am in the series - fingers crossed) there's no pointless romantic subplots between her and Sherlock, just a straight played female Watson. Hats off to Lucy Liu for making a tough character change that I was prepared to dislike so likable and real.

The best part of the show however is the writing. Writing good mysteries is a fine line to walk. You can either give too little information and blindside the viewer, leaving them feeling shut out and just along for the ride, or too much information delivered too overtly and ruin the fun of following step in step with the details. The truth has to be there somewhere for you to see but not too soon. Elementary manages to walk that line very well. There have been times when something was too obvious or too unpredictable, but much more often the truth is cleverly masked until just the right time - a little before it's revealed, if you're sharp. 

I went into this series with low expectations but very quickly fell in love with it. Whether you like the different spin on Arthur Conan Doyle's characters or not, Elementary does mystery right, and it's worth a watch based on that alone.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":105939,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2012-09-27","keywords":"new york city detective,british in america,detective,modernized setting,companionship","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001538/","name":"Jonny Lee Miller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005154/","name":"Lucy Liu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001644/","name":"Aidan Quinn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0395934/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1201266/","name":"Robert Doherty"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 4 First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2393551385","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1MDgwOTE5OTJeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQ0NTU2MTcx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1MDgwOTE5OTJeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQ0NTU2MTcx._V1_.jpg","description":"See what's in store in season 4 of "Elemetary.""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2191671, Title: Elementary, --- Description: Elementary: Created by Robert Doherty. With Jonny Lee Miller, Lucy Liu, Aidan Quinn, Jon Michael Hill. A modern take on the cases of Sherlock Holmes, with the detective now living in New York City." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2191671/","name":"Elementary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDEyN2U1YTItNDY1Zi00YjljLWI5YzItNWU3YWViYjhiZTgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A modern take on the cases of Sherlock Holmes, with the detective now living in New York City.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2191671/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"William_G","dateCreated":"2013-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"A different spin on a classic, A great show on its own merits","reviewBody":"Like many people, I love BBC's Sherlock and overlooked Elementary for many reasons. I recently decided to give it a chance and was pleasantly surprised to say the least. First off, don't make the same mistake I did and dismiss it for some of the rather odd sounding changes, it's intended to be a different spin on the classic and does so very well.

Jonny Lee Miller plays a great Sherlock. He's more human and flawed, where the original Sherlock was almost cartoonishly strong at times, but he still has the same confident eccentric brilliance that makes Sherlock Holmes so interesting. He's a recovering addict aided by Sober Companion Watson, a modern politically correct spin on classic Holmes drug use that feels tacked on and out of place at times, but helps drive the character development of both Holmes and Watson.

The new Watson angle was a big factor in what made me pass on the show at first. In addition to the Sober Companion job, it sounded very generic Hollywoody to find an excuse to shoehorn in a pretty female co-star, but Lucy Liu is very good in her role. She doesn't play a shallow sexy distraction from the story, rather just a different sex portraying the same inquisitive, intelligent, adventurous companion that Watson should be. And (as far as I am in the series - fingers crossed) there's no pointless romantic subplots between her and Sherlock, just a straight played female Watson. Hats off to Lucy Liu for making a tough character change that I was prepared to dislike so likable and real.

The best part of the show however is the writing. Writing good mysteries is a fine line to walk. You can either give too little information and blindside the viewer, leaving them feeling shut out and just along for the ride, or too much information delivered too overtly and ruin the fun of following step in step with the details. The truth has to be there somewhere for you to see but not too soon. Elementary manages to walk that line very well. There have been times when something was too obvious or too unpredictable, but much more often the truth is cleverly masked until just the right time - a little before it's revealed, if you're sharp. 

I went into this series with low expectations but very quickly fell in love with it. Whether you like the different spin on Arthur Conan Doyle's characters or not, Elementary does mystery right, and it's worth a watch based on that alone.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":105939,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2012-09-27","keywords":"new york city detective,british in america,detective,modernized setting,companionship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001538/","name":"Jonny Lee Miller","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005154/","name":"Lucy Liu","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001644/","name":"Aidan Quinn"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0395934/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1201266/","name":"Robert Doherty"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 4 First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2393551385","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1MDgwOTE5OTJeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQ0NTU2MTcx._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1MDgwOTE5OTJeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQ0NTU2MTcx._V1_.jpg","description":"See what's in store in season 4 of "Elemetary.""</script><metacontent="

programme.title: True Blood
True Blood
True Blood
programme.desc: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."}}</script><metacontent="

Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756","dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"automation21","dateCreated":"2002-05-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entrancing, confronting, charming, absolutely mindbending. Feels like an insult to call it television","reviewBody":"And I rarely even watch television. I'm a book person.

Not since the "X-Files" has a TV show been so intriguing. Every time I watch an episode, I am struck back be depth of storyline, the intricate characters and the left-of-the-middle storytelling. I literally cannot control myself from discussing each new episode with (bored) family members.

SFU is a very introverted show - it resembles more a book or play than television. While the latter is extroverted and relies on events happening to characters (eg: the overboard emergencies of ER or the romances in soaps) to carry the story, Six Feet Under wants to communicate the deepest feelings and ideals of the people on screen. As a result, it not only stimulates the mind but also helps us analyse ourselves.

In the hands of any other creators, this would make for a very dull hour of suburban spirituality, but Allan Ball's menagerie of ghosts, (past characters influencing the present) trippy daydream sequences, surreal atmosphere and some wicked black humour make for a very entertaining show and sell what would otherwise be a marketing disaster to the masses. On top of that, every component from acting to directing to screenplay is flawless. (the dead boy's ghost in "a private life" still chills me to the bone).

Most, of all I admire the characters: some of the most complex and enchanting creatures ever to grace the idiot box. After a few episodes, they feel like a second family.

While I do have my complaints about the amount of obscenity, (I can swear that sometimes the writers want to offend us just for fun) I have to give my show the highest commendations. There are, of course, moments when I feel like throwing my chair at the television, but that is simply the consequence of watching a show that challenges me, rather than offer cheap amusement.

SFU may take a while to get into, but the rewards are bountiful.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":128234,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175814/","name":"Frances Conroy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010714/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030266/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Six Feet Under: The Complete Second Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2609381657","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Treme
Treme
Treme
programme.sub-title: S1 E6 S1 E6 Shallow Water, Oh Mama
programme.desc:
Treme: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer, David Simon. With Khandi Alexander, Rob Brown, Kim Dickens, Melissa Leo. Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1279972/","name":"Treme","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjg4ZGZkYjEtYTZhMy00YjU1LTg1MTYtNDlmNTAwYTA0M2NmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1279972/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bilko-1"},"dateCreated":"2010-04-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"A major artistic achievement from David Simon","reviewBody":"My first impression, from watching episode one, was that the writing did not have the flow of "The Wire" it was trying too hard to register the many characters and to quickly tick off the various "types" that make up New Orleans society. Bunk and Freeman were too firmly placed in my memory for me to make the leap to Antoine and Albert. As for the Steve Zahn character, I instantly took a dislike to him and found him unrealistic in the extreme.

By the time we had reached the scene with the Big Chief emerging from the dark, I had become hooked. The characters started to make sense. The generous helping of musical scenes produced what must be the finest portrayal of live music and musicians I have ever seen. I could not wait to catch episode two.

I have now watched the first two episodes twice and all my first impressions have been blown away. Once you get to know the characters and can watch their introduction again, things start to make sense. Steve Zahn? What a brilliant comic creation. Just watch the intro to episode two, his creeping around Elvis Costello, his first day on the job. Absolutely first rate, The shocking introduction of violence, suddenly alters ones perceptions of a major character. Bunk, still lingers in the memory, but Antoine's blowing is going to change all that. I was not familiar with Khandi Alexander, but am now a major fan. Her performance is charismatic in the extreme.

I know that this series is not going to be to everyone's liking, but then neither is Shakespeare or Dickens. However, for those who enjoy a multi-faceted piece of work that can examine society in minute detail whilst never failing to entertain, this will surely rank as a major piece of American art.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14232,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2010-04-11","keywords":"21st century,post hurricane katrina,reference to hurricane katrina,radio station,alternative music","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0018554/","name":"Khandi Alexander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0114532/","name":"Rob Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0225332/","name":"Kim Dickens"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019588/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0284741/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0653899/","name":"Eric Ellis Overmyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800108/","name":"David Simon"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season Four Preview","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4226458905","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the season four trailer for "Treme"!"}}</script><metacontent="

The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. programme.title: The Breed
The Breed
programme.desc: The Breed: Directed by Nicholas Mastandrea. With Michelle Rodriguez, Oliver Hudson, Taryn Manning, Eric Lively. A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455362/","name":"The Breed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg5ODA5MzAxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzkyNDM2MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455362/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ThrownMuse"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stupid but entertaining","reviewBody":"A bunch of undergrads (played by 30 and 40somethings--no joke!) take their jet to an abandoned island for a vacation. Because undergrads do that? They get attacked by wild dogs that turn out to be genetically engineered killers. Scary! History has taught me to stay away from anything labeled "Wes Craven Presents," but I decided to check this out because how bad could a movie starring Michelle Rodriguez vs Killer Dogs be? Rodriguez isn't the best actress, but I always enjoy seeing her one-note tough-girl shtick in movies or TV (long live Ana Lucia!) And she does her own stunts in this! There's no CGI, which is commendable, though I'm not entirely sure how I feel about a large number of dogs being trained to attack for the sake of a dumb horror movie. And this is, indeed, a dumb horror movie. All the clichés are intact, the writing is awful, and there's even a dumb subplot about brotherly love. Or something. Taryn Manning is cast as the "hottie" of the group, though she looks washed-up and talks like she smokes six packs a day. There's an interesting subplot with her character that would have made the movie more interesting had it been expanded upon. This is enjoyable for what it is, but it's nothing special.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13037,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2008-01-30","keywords":"island,cabin in the woods,animal attack,survival,natural horror","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Breed (2006)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1938424089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from First Look Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005029/","name":"Oliver Hudson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543383/","name":"Taryn Manning"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0557608/","name":"Nicholas Mastandrea"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049118/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148083/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068448/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176256/","name":"Robert Conte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941810/","name":"Peter Wortmann"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Sniper: Assassin's End
Sniper: Assassin's End
programme.desc: Sniper: Assassin's End: Directed by Kaare Andrews. With Chad Michael Collins, Sayaka Akimoto, Tom Berenger, Ryan Robbins. Legendary sniper Thomas Beckett and his son, Special Ops Sniper Brandon Beckett, are on the run from the CIA, Russian Mercenaries, and a Yakuza-trained assassin with sniper skills that rival both legendary sharp shooters." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12305696/","name":"Sniper: Assassin's End","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNlNzBhNzMtNWNiOC00MGMxLWI3YjktNWMwNzJjMDEyZGQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzY1ODU1OTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Legendary sniper Thomas Beckett and his son, Special Ops Sniper Brandon Beckett, are on the run from the CIA, Russian Mercenaries, and a Yakuza-trained assassin with sniper skills that rival both legendary sharp shooters.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12305696/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shakercoola"},"dateCreated":"2021-10-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sassy spec-ops action","reviewBody":"An American action-thriller; The 8th film in the Sniper series. It follows two of the three recurring lead characters in the long running series: U. S. Marine Sgt Brandon Beckett, and Thomas Beckett, a former Mastery Gunnery Sgt of Force Reconnaissance Scout Snipers in United States Marine Corps. Set up as the primary suspect for the murder of a foreign dignitary and on the run from the CIA, Brandon Beckett takes on Russian mercenaries and a yakuza-trained assassin. This comic-book stylized sequel has some good action and impressive martial arts skills and a story that doesn't rely on knowledge of the past films. There is also good photography around marksmanship and concealment harking back to the original film. Although this has a run-of-the-mill plot and doesn't push any boundaries. Sayaka Akimoto gave the film some vitality and an interesting streak of colour.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1984,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-09-09","keywords":"sniper,narrow escape,special ops,trade agreement,blood splatter","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sniper: Assassin's End","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi87539225","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTE2MzAzMzUtZDJhNS00MWQ4LTgzOGUtNTkwYmM2NDg3MGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTE2MzAzMzUtZDJhNS00MWQ4LTgzOGUtNTkwYmM2NDg3MGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1792864/","name":"Chad Michael Collins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2687122/","name":"Sayaka Akimoto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000297/","name":"Tom Berenger"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1543846/","name":"Kaare Andrews"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017834/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137851/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3681509/","name":"Oliver Thompson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065847/","name":"Michael Frost Beckner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0508052/","name":"Crash Leyland"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
Hellboy 2: Die goldene Armee
programme.desc:
Hellboy II: The Golden Army: Directed by Guillermo del Toro. With Ron Perlman, Selma Blair, Doug Jones, John Alexander. A prince of the mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth, and Hellboy his team must fight to stop him from locating the all-powerful Golden Army." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0411477/","name":"Hellboy II: The Golden Army","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5NzgyMjc2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTU3MDI3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A prince of the mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth, and Hellboy his team must fight to stop him from locating the all-powerful Golden Army.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0411477/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sam_smithreview"},"dateCreated":"2016-04-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Simply put, a well deserved sequel to its fans","reviewBody":"Let me start of by saying that Del Toro had one message to the fans, and it was "I will not disappoint"

I have long felt that the first Hellboy installment is one of the most underrated films of the 2000's. The first thing you notice about both the first film and this more than worthy successor is the passion. Everything is simply beautiful (not in the typical beautiful sense, but in that you appreciate the art that it is), and it should come as no surprise as the film's director, Guillermo Del Toro, is a long time fan of the comic stories on which the movie is based. Del Toro turned down multiple high profile projects, including multiple Harry Potter films, so he could work on the Hellboy series, which we all know will not gross as much money. Del Toro's passion for excellence is evident in this wonderful sequel, which is better than the first, and cements Del Toro's place as one of the top filmmakers of today.

The first thing I liked about the movie: the easy transition from the first to the second movie. Though I don't remember exact plot details, it was very easy for me to get back into the story, world, and especially our three main characters. I'd reckon that you could watch this movie without having seen the first and still have a great time (though, it helps). A great cast with great chemistry more than sets the tone and makes this one very watchable.

First, you've got Ron Perlman. For those of you who don't know this terribly underrated actor, he's one you can't afford to miss as Hellboy. Even though he's covered in make-up and prosthetic's, Perlman does a great job of making us love him as a hero, and a man. This is something most of the superhero performers do not (or perhaps cannot) do. The just-as-passionate-as-Del-Toro Doug Jones leaves a HUGE mark on the viewer here, not just for his performance as Abe Sapien, but for his remarkable range as a couple of other characters in the movie. Luke Goss is the film's villain, and I really saw the dedication in his performance as well, something required for his character, who is of course a dedicated man. He's not necessarily the typical 'evil' character, but a somewhat misguided one, and I think Goss got that across to me very well. A fact often ignored by critics in the comic book/superhero realm of films is the supporting heroine. Most times, without the audience knowing it, this character makes or breaks the movie. Selma Blair, boy does she make it. Not only does she look absolutely stunning as Liz Sherman, she takes the final act into her hands and does wonders with it. Definitely the best performance I've ever seen from Ms. Blair. Add in a hilarious and great performance from Seth MacFarlane (yes, the voice of multiple Family Guy characters, I know I looked it up too!! Have to give it to him) as Johann Kraus's voice, and Anna Walton as Princess Nuala, and you've got the best ensemble of the year thus far.

As for the action, it's stunning. Hellboy has a LOT more to work with than the traditional superhero film, and Del Toro more than takes advantage of it. With action ranging from lighting fast and well shot sword fighting and hand to hand combat to Hellboy versus a giant plant (the Last forest Elder) and what a fight it was, it's a sight to behold as we watch a legendary director in the making perfect his craft once again. There were multiple times where I found myself saying "holy crap", or "wow". Del Toro also keeps some humor in there to balance the much darker tone of the film. 

The film has also an incredible awesome version of the song lovesick. but that's for you to find out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":263599,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2008-10-08","keywords":"superhero,twins,friendship,cat,elf","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. teaser trailer: Hellboy II: The Golden Army","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1588723993","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTIwMDU5MjI5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjM2ODc5._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTIwMDU5MjI5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjM2ODc5._V1_.jpg","description":"This is a teaser trailer for Hellboy II: The Golden Army, directed by Guillermo del Toro"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000579/","name":"Ron Perlman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004757/","name":"Selma Blair"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427964/","name":"Doug Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868219/","name":"Guillermo del Toro"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020061/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0239918/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868219/","name":"Guillermo del Toro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586005/","name":"Mike Mignola"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="
